verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> heard שְׁפַטְיָ֣ה <S%H8203><s%> Then Shephatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַתָּ֗ן <S%H4977><s%> of Mattan וּגְדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1436><s%> and Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פַּשְׁח֔וּר <S%H6583><s%> of Pashur וְיוּכַל֙ <S%H3116><s%> and Jucal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שֶׁ֣לֶמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H8018><s%> of Shelemiah וּפַשְׁח֖וּר <S%H6583><s%> and Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <S%H4441><s%> of Malchiah אֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> that יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that Jeremiah מְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying ס

כֹּה֮ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> He that remaineth בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יָמ֕וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence וְהַיֹּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> but he that goeth forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכַּשְׂדִּים֙ <S%H3778><s%> to the Chaldeans [יִחְיֶה כ] (וְחָיָ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> will live ק) וְהָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> and have לּ֥וֹ נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <S%H5315><s%> for he shall have his life לְשָׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> for a prey וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2421><s%> shall live ס

כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנָּתֹ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> shall surely תִּנָּתֵ֜ן <S%H5414><s%> be given הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> This city הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> into בְּיַ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand חֵ֥יל <S%H2428><s%> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon's וּלְכָדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> which shall take

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said הַשָּׂרִ֜ים <S%H8269><s%> Therefore the princes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king י֣וּמַת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death נָא֮ <S%H4994><s%> Now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> We beseech thee let this man הַזֶּה֒ <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> for thus הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he מְרַפֵּ֡א <S%H7503><s%> he weakeneth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵי֩ <S%H3027><s%> the hands אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> unto them for this man הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> of war הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים ׀ <S%H7604><s%> that remain בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> and the hands כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> in speaking אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is not דֹרֵ֧שׁ <S%H1875><s%> seeketh לְשָׁל֛וֹם <S%H7965><s%> not the welfare לָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> of this כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but לְרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> but the hurt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Then Zedekiah הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> Behold he [is] in your hand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> for הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> [is] not [he that] can אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> do [any] thing

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> Then took אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> they Jeremiah וַיַּשְׁלִ֨כוּ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבּ֣וֹר ׀ <S%H953><s%> him into the dungeon מַלְכִּיָּ֣הוּ <S%H4441><s%> of Malchiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4429><s%> Melech אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בַּחֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> that [was] in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֔ה <S%H4307><s%> of the prison וַיְשַׁלְּח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> and they let down אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah בַּחֲבָלִ֑ים <S%H2256><s%> with cords וּבַבּ֤וֹר <S%H953><s%> And in the dungeon אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> [there was] no water כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> only טִ֔יט <S%H2916><s%> but mire וַיִּטְבַּ֥ע <S%H2883><s%> sunk יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> so Jeremiah בַּטִּֽיט׃ <S%H2916><s%> in the mire ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֡ע <S%H8085><s%> heard עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H5663><s%> Now when Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֜י <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopian אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one סָרִ֗יס <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which was in the king's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> that they had put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבּ֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> in the dungeon וְהַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> then sitting בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H5663><s%> Ebedmelech מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> out of the king's וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הֵרֵ֜עוּ <S%H7489><s%> have done evil הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> in all that they have done לְיִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> whom they have cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבּ֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the dungeon וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> and he is like to die תַּחְתָּיו֙ <S%H8478><s%> in the place מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> for הָֽרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> hunger כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there הַלֶּ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> where he is for [there is] no more bread ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more בָּעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> in the city

וַיְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H5663><s%> Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֖י <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopian לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> Take בְּיָדְךָ֤ <S%H3027><s%> with thee מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> here שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> from hence thirty אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men וְֽהַעֲלִ֜יתָ <S%H5927><s%> and take up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֧הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבּ֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the dungeon בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> before he die

וַיִּקַּ֣ח ׀ <S%H3947><s%> took עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H5663><s%> So Ebedmelech אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> the men בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> with him וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> and went בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath הָאוֹצָ֔ר <S%H214><s%> under the treasury וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and took מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there בְּלוֹיֵ֣ <S%H1094><s%> thence old [הַסְּחָבֹות כ] (סְחָבֹ֔ות <S%H5499><s%> cast clout ק) וּבְלוֹיֵ֖ <S%H1094><s%> and old מְלָחִ֑ים <S%H4418><s%> rotten rags וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֧ם <S%H7971><s%> and let them down אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <S%H3414><s%> to Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבּ֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the dungeon בַּחֲבָלִֽים׃ <S%H2256><s%> by cords

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֶבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H5663><s%> And Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֜י <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopian אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> Put נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> Now בְּלוֹאֵ֨י <S%H1094><s%> now [these] old הַסְּחָב֤וֹת <S%H5499><s%> cast clouts וְהַמְּלָחִים֙ <S%H4418><s%> and rotten rags תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אַצִּל֣וֹת <S%H679><s%> joint יָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H3027><s%> able מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לַחֲבָלִ֑ים <S%H2256><s%> under the cords וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> And Jeremiah כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיִּמְשְׁכ֤וּ <S%H4900><s%> So they drew up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah בַּֽחֲבָלִ֔ים <S%H2256><s%> with cords וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and took him up אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבּ֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the dungeon וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> remained יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> and Jeremiah בַּחֲצַ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court הַמַּטָּרָֽה׃ <S%H4307><s%> of the prison ס
